TravelGroundBadPlains.Title: Travel Ground Bad Plains
Items: deep battlefield trenches criss-cross in your way, making for tiresome and time-consuming obstacles
deeply rutted paths make walking treacherous
the densely-packed tall grasses here make movement difficult
thick underbrush has destroyed all traces of any other typical routes
the wasps this area is rife with complicate all movement
the soft earth here belabors every step as feet sink into it
the berms of an ancient battlefield make the area tiresome to trudge through
a swift river you weren?t expecting runs across your direction of travel
long unbroken hedgerows are constantly in the way
the area is absolutely choked with sticker bushes
there is a wide riverbed in the way with lazy water and muddy sides
large areas of rubble periodically block your path
the uneven ground from tilled rows of ancient farmers adds to the difficulty
the thick underbrush makes it twice as frustrating
what seemed like solid, cracked mud on the ground at first turned out to be only a dried layer atop actual, terribly thick mud
impossibly deep mud exhausts every effort to traverse it- as every step sinks into it nearly a foot deep
the ground is absolutely infested with thorn-riddled picker bushes here
the grass is so high here visibility is reduced nearly to zero
this area is rife with biting insects
the whole area is comprised of thick grasses that slow your movements
